resources.string: FarmErce is a mobile application developed for E-Commerce of vegetables.
You can search vegetables on the home page based upon the categories, as we have categorized the vegetables based upon its type.
For example, we have Beetroot which falls under root vegetables and hence it is categorized into Root Category of all categories.
The different categories of vegetables are, \n Bulb, Flower, Fruity, Leafy, Root, Seed and Stem Vegetables which include product lists.

So, Bulb vegetables: Garlic, Onion, Spring Onion 
 Flower vegetables: Broccoli, Cauliflower 
 Fruity vegetables: Bittergourd, Bottlegourd, Brinjal, Courgette, Cucumber, Green Capsicum, Green Chilli, Lady finger, Mix Capsicum, Mix Chilli, Pumpkin, Red capsicum Red Chilli, Tomato, Yellow Capsicum 
 Leafy vegetables: Cabbage, Coriander, Curry leaves, Dill(Sabbasige), Fenugreek(Methi), Lettuce, Spinach 
 Root vegetables: Beetroot, Carrot, Ginger, Potato, Radish, Sweet Potato, Turnip 
 Seed vegetables: Beans, Drumstick, Green Peas, Legumes, Sweet Corn 
 and Stem vegetables: Asparagus, Celery, Kohlrabi.

Order status can be tracked and will be updated like Order Confirmed for confirming the order, On the Way for the product which are about to be delivered and Order Delivered for the product that is delivered.
